QuestData.Title: If You Want Peace...
QuestData.Description:
Maldraxxus is a land which revels in strife and conflict. But they should also be bound by honor.
If their honor has been tossed aside, then they may move their forces beyond just Bastion.
Take care, danger lies beyond that gate. It is a realm of heroes as well as a realm of villains.
QuestData.RewardText: Well? Why aren't you out there fighting?

Objectives.Objective: Speak to Roh-Avonavi to Travel to Maldraxxus
